thread.title: Queens water main break snarls traffic, delays subway trains
thread.title_full: Queens water main break snarls traffic, delays subway trains - NY Daily News

author: NEW YORK DAILY NEWS
title: Queens water main break snarls traffic, delays subway trains
text:
WNYW A stretch of Queens Blvd. in Elmhurst was shut down Friday as the muddy water spewed wildy from the ruptured pipe. NYPD It was unclear what caused the 8 a.m. break that pumped water into the surrounding streets. WNYW Police were advising drivers to avoid the flooded neighborhood. Previous Next Enlarge A massive Queens water main break flooded streets around a construction site, crippling Friday morning rush hour traffic and turning nearby streets into urban rivers.
A stretch of Queens Blvd. in Elmhurst was shut down as the muddy water spewed wildy from the ruptured pipe. Local subway and bus service was also affected by the gushing water.
Police were advising drivers to avoid the flooded neighborhood, where E, F, M and R trains were running with delays because of the break.
It was unclear what caused the 8 a.m. break that pumped water into the surrounding streets.
lmcshane@nydailynews.com
